home.title: Welcome
home.text1: The Agali Studios rentals are a family-run business that began in 2025.
home.text2: They are located right by the sea on the Aidipsos–Lichados provincial road, a few minutes by car from the port of Loutra Aidipsou or Agiokampos. In Loutra Aidipsou you can pick up your groceries and go out for food and drinks.
home.text3: The property has a total of 4 double apartments with balconies. They are all fully furnished and include everything a guest needs for a pleasant stay. From the balcony you can enjoy the sea view, while in our garden you can sit in the gazebo next to the olive trees.

reservations.title: Reservation
reservations.text1: Thank you for your interest in staying with us!
reservations.text2: Availability at our property can be checked via the form below. If you enter your desired dates and number of guests, our site will automatically forward you to the secure booking platform.
reservations.text3: If you have any questions or prefer to book by phone, don’t hesitate to contact us.

accommodation.title: Our Studios
accommodation.text1: Our 28 m² studios with a double bed are ideal for two people/couples. They are fully furnished and equipped with appliances so you can have a comfortable stay and enjoy your holiday in our area.
accommodation.text2: Specifically, they have a refrigerator, cooking hobs, built-in oven, kettle, and toaster.
accommodation.text3: Additionally they are equipped with dishes, glasses, cutlery, and basic cooking utensils for you to use during your stay.
accommodation.text4: Finally, all apartments have their own bathroom with shower, towels, and personal hygiene items.
accommodation.text5: The spacious balcony has chairs and a table so you can enjoy your breakfast with a view of the North Evoikos Gulf.

contact.title: Get in touch with us
contact.haveQuestions: Do you have questions or want to book? We are always at your service!
contact.onYourService: The <1>Agali Studios</1> is a family-run business created with love for hospitality and respect for the guest. We look forward to welcoming you to our beautiful space by the sea and providing you with a carefree and comfortable stay.
contact.locationDetails: Provincial road Aidipsos – Lichada, a few minutes from Loutra Aidipsou & Agiokampos
contact.happyToHelp: Whether you’re planning a summer holiday or a short getaway, we are here to make your stay unique. Contact us today – we’d be happy to serve you!
